verses.1: Tua ciangin Teman khuami Elifaz in Job dawng a,
verses.2: “Job aw, mawk paupau kei in! Nangʼ pau bangin mipilte pau ngei lo a,
verses.3: bangmah-a kimang lo kampaute pau lo a, phattuamna om lo dingpi-in thu seel lo uh hi.
verses.4: Ahi zongin nangmah in Pasian zahtakna na beisak a, ama mai ah thugenna ding na khaktan hi.
verses.5: Tu-in na mawhna thu na kam pan hong ging khia a, ngian zangin na kampau tawh na mawhna na seel hi.
verses.6: Na mawhna thu keiʼ hong gen kisam lo a, na pauna khempeuh in na mawhna hong langsak ta hi.
verses.7: “Mihing a a piang lakah a masa pen kisa na hi hiam? Pasian in mualte a bawl lai-in a piang khin kisa na hi hiam?
verses.8: Pasianʼ vaihawmnate a za simin kingaihsun na hiam? Nang bek in pilna khempeuh a nei-in kingaihsun na hi hiam?
verses.9: Koʼ theih loh thu bang thei tuan na hi hiam? Koʼ muh loh thu bang mu tuan na hi hiam?
verses.10: Na paʼ pian ma a a piang puteek sam kangteʼ tung panin kote in ka pilnate uh a ngah ka hi uh hi.
verses.11: “Pasian in nang hong hehnem hi; bang hangin nialnial na hi hiam? Kam khum kam nem tawh Pasianʼ tangin nang tungah thu kong gen uh hi.
verses.12: Ahih hangin na lung khauhin kote nong heh et hi.
verses.13: Pasianʼ tungah a heh na hi a, amah a simmawh na hi hi.
verses.14: “Mihing a a piang peuhmah paubaang het loin siangtho taktak zo ding ahi hiam? Pasianʼ tungah a thuman zo kua om ding ahi hiam?
verses.15: Pasian in a siangtho vantung mite nangawn muang lo ahihleh, ei mawhnei mite bang hangin hong muang mah ding ahi hiam?
verses.16: Mihing in tui i dawn bangin siatna i dawndawn a, mihing pen siahuai-in bangmah i man kei hi.
verses.17: “Job aw, ka thutheihte na ngai in.
verses.18: Amaute tung bekah gam kipia ahih manin, amaute a pialkhiat pih ding gamdang mi tawh a kihel lo, a pu a pate un bangmah im loin thu a hilh suksuk uh mipilteʼ thugente kong gen ding hi. Tua a gen uh thute in:
verses.20: “Mi a nengniam migilo pa in a khan tawntungin lungkhamna thuak ding hi.
verses.21: Launa ding awging a bilah za ngitnget dinga, lungmuangin a om laitakin gutate in buluh ding hi.
verses.22: Lungzinna pan suahtak nading lametna om lo a, amah a that dingin mun khat ah namsau in ngak khinkhian a,
verses.23: amah a ne dingin musanete in a ngak uh hi. A mailam thu lungzinhuai ahihna thei hi.
verses.24: A thahat kumpi khat bangin lungkhamna le lungzinna in amah a hih gawp dingin a ngak khikhe hi.
verses.25: “Pasian langpangin a khuttum a lah san, Vanglian pa a dem mipa in hih bang thute a thuak hi.
verses.26: Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in khauh takin Pasian langpangin, a lum sahpi tawh a lehdo hi.
verses.27: “A thatang muanhuai-in a pumpi a liat hangin
verses.28: ama teenna khuapi sia-in, ama inn kinusia dinga, a sawt loin ninbu lomtang suak ding hi.
verses.29: Amah sauvei hau lo dinga, a neihsate kip lo ding hi. Ama liim nangawn maimang dinga,
verses.30: khuamial panin suakta lo ding hi. Amah pen a hiangte mei in a kat tumsak, a paakte huih in a let khiatsak, singkung tawh kibang ding hi.
verses.31: Amah in gitlohna suanin nei ahih manin, gitlohna bek mah ngahkik ding hi.
verses.32: A hun a tun ma-in amah bei dinga, singhiang bangin keu-in hingkik nawn lo ding hi.
verses.33: A min ma-in a gahte a pulh leenggui bang dinga, a paakte a pulh mangkhin oliv kung bang ding hi.
verses.34: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian a ngaihsun lote mi cimang suak a, sumgolh tawh a kilam innte mei in kaang tum hi.
verses.35: Mihingte in siat nading bek ngaihsunin sem uh a, mi khem ding bekbek ngaihsun niloh uh hi,” a ci hi.
